attributes.action: Sack MPs That have constituents  voted leave but their the MPS want to remain!
attributes.background: There are 200 MPS saying they want to block WTO deal , even though that is the default position in our negotiations with the EU,  it also makes our negotiations weak with the EU, them knowing we will not walk away from a bad deal

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
